summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of DataPulse new features - Cases page (with CaseDetailPanel), Quality Dashboard (with tabs and metrics), and Settings page (with API & Export tab). All features are working correctly with excellent UI/UX.
passed_tests: Cases page - displays correctly with 4 stats cards (Total Cases, Open, In Progress, Completed)
Cases page - table displays with columns (Respondent ID, Name, Status, Visits, Last Visit, Created, Actions)
Cases page - filters work (search input, project filter dropdown, status filter dropdown)
Cases page - Create Case dialog opens and works (Project dropdown, Respondent ID input, Name input, Create button)
Cases page - case creation API integration works (case created successfully with toast notification)
Cases page - Case Detail Panel (Sheet component) opens when clicking case row
Cases page - Case Detail Panel shows respondent info card with avatar and details
Cases page - Case Detail Panel has 4 status update buttons (Open, In Progress, Completed, Closed)
Cases page - Case Detail Panel Details tab shows Contact Information and Tags sections
Cases page - Case Detail Panel History tab shows Visit History with form names and quality scores
Cases page - Case Detail Panel Notes tab has textarea, Add Note button, and displays existing notes
Quality Dashboard - displays 8 metric cards (Average Quality Score, Total Submissions, Completion Rate, Avg Response Time, Flagged Issues, Rejection Rate, Active Enumerators, Validation Score)
Quality Dashboard - tabbed interface works (Overview, Enumerators, Trends tabs)
Quality Dashboard - Quality Score gauge chart renders correctly
Quality Dashboard - Score Distribution bar chart renders correctly
Quality Dashboard - Submission Status section shows data or 'No data available' placeholder
Quality Dashboard - Quality Flags section shows flags or 'No quality flags detected' message
Quality Dashboard - Enumerators tab shows enumerator performance table
Quality Dashboard - Trends tab shows submission trends area chart
Settings page - 5 tabs present and working (Profile, Appearance, Alerts, Organization, API & Export)
Settings page - Profile tab has avatar, name input, email input, language dropdown, Save Changes button
Settings page - Appearance tab has Light/Dark theme switcher, Compact Mode toggle, Animations toggle
Settings page - Alerts tab has Email Notifications section and Push Notifications section with toggles
Settings page - Organization tab has org name, slug, data collection settings, security settings
Settings page - API & Export tab has API Keys section with show/hide, copy, regenerate buttons
Settings page - API key show/hide functionality works correctly
Settings page - API key copy button works (copies to clipboard)
Settings page - Export Settings section has format dropdown, date format dropdown, timezone dropdown, metadata toggle
Settings page - Data Management section has Export All Data, Download Audit Log, Delete All Data options
Navigation - sidebar navigation works correctly between all pages (Dashboard, Projects, Forms, Submissions, Cases, Quality, Exports, Team, Settings)
seed_data_creation: Created test case with Respondent ID 'TEST-001' and name 'Test Respondent' in 'Health Survey 2026' project
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 enhanced pages (Cases, Quality, Settings) are fully functional. Cases page has a slide-out CaseDetailPanel with Details/History/Notes tabs. Quality Dashboard has Overview/Enumerators/Trends tabs with 8 metric cards and charts. Settings has 5 tabs including new API & Export tab with API key management and export configuration.
